42 uint16_t X10ApiBase::Crc_check(uint8_t *DATA)
43 {
44 
45  return crc_.crc16(DATA, RS485_MAX - 2);
46 }
47 
48 void X10ApiBase::RS485_send_driver(uint8_t id, uint8_t data_length, uint8_t *p_buffer, std::vector<uint8_t> &send_data_serial_)
49 {
50  send_data_serial_.clear();
51  uint16_t T_Num = 3;
52  send_data_serial_.push_back(0x3e);
53  send_data_serial_.push_back(id);
54  send_data_serial_.push_back(data_length);
55  for (T_Num = 3; T_Num < (RS485_MAX - 2); T_Num++)
56  {
57  send_data_serial_.push_back(p_buffer[T_Num - 3]);
58  }
59 
60  T_Num = Crc_check(send_data_serial_.data());
61  send_data_serial_.push_back(((uint8_t)T_Num));
62  send_data_serial_.push_back(((uint8_t)(T_Num >> 8)));
63 
64  receive_data_serial_.clear();
65  serial_.send_receive_serial_b(send_data_serial_, receive_data_serial_);
66 }
67 
68 int8_t X10ApiBase::error_check()
69 {
70  uint16_t check_crc = Crc_check(receive_data_serial_.data());
71  uint16_t data_crc = (receive_data_serial_[RS485_MAX - 2] | (receive_data_serial_[RS485_MAX - 1] << 8));
72 
73  if ((check_crc == data_crc) && (send_data_serial_[1] == receive_data_serial_[1]))
74  return 1;
75 
76  return 0;
77 }

93 int8_t X10ApiBase::Motor_read_pid(uint8_t id, uint8_t *data_arr)
94 {
95  RS485_send_driver(id, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_Motor_read_pid, send_data_serial_);
96 
97  data_arr[0] = (uint8_t)(receive_data_serial_[5]); // currKP
98  data_arr[1] = (uint8_t)(receive_data_serial_[6]); // currKI
99  data_arr[2] = (uint8_t)(receive_data_serial_[7]); // spdKP
100  data_arr[3] = (uint8_t)(receive_data_serial_[8]); // spdKI
101  data_arr[4] = (uint8_t)(receive_data_serial_[9]); // posKP
102  data_arr[5] = (uint8_t)(receive_data_serial_[10]); // posKI
103 
104  return error_check();
105 }

107 int8_t X10ApiBase::Write_pid_RAM(uint8_t id_, uint8_t CurrKP, uint8_t CurrKI, uint8_t SpdKP, uint8_t SpdKI, uint8_t PosKP, uint8_t PosKI)
108 {
109  RS485_send_driver(id_, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_Write_pid_RAM, send_data_serial_);
110  return error_check();
111 }

119 int32_t X10ApiBase::Motor_read_accel(uint8_t id_)
120 {
121  RS485_send_driver(id_, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_Read_Accel, send_data_serial_);
122 
123  return (int32_t)((receive_data_serial_[7]) | (receive_data_serial_[8] << 8) | (receive_data_serial_[9] << 16) | (receive_data_serial_[10] << 24));
124 }

126 int32_t X10ApiBase::multi_turn_encoder_pos(uint8_t id_)
127 {
128  RS485_send_driver(id_, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_multi_turn_encoder_pos, send_data_serial_);
129 
130  return (int32_t)((receive_data_serial_[7]) | (receive_data_serial_[8] << 8) | (receive_data_serial_[9] << 16) | (receive_data_serial_[10] << 24));
131 }

133 int8_t X10ApiBase::Motor_state1(uint8_t id, int16_t *data_arr)
134 {
135 
136  RS485_send_driver(id, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_Motor_state1, send_data_serial_);
137  // printf("received id: %d\n",id);
138  // printf("send data: ");
139  // for (int i = 0; i < 13; i++)
140  // {
141  // printf("%x ", send_data_serial_[i]);
142  // }
143  // printf("\n");
144  // printf("received data: ");
145  // for (int i = 0; i < 13; i++)
146  // {
147  // printf("%x ", receive_data_serial_[i]);
148  // }
149  // printf("\n");
150 
151  data_arr[0] = (int8_t)receive_data_serial_[4]; // temp
152  data_arr[1] = (uint8_t)receive_data_serial_[6]; // brake release command
153  data_arr[2] = (uint16_t)((receive_data_serial_[7]) | (receive_data_serial_[8] << 8)); // voltage
154  data_arr[3] = (uint16_t)((receive_data_serial_[9]) | (receive_data_serial_[10] << 8)); // error state
155  return error_check();
156 }
157 
158 int8_t X10ApiBase::Motor_state2(uint8_t id, int16_t *data_arr)
159 {
160 
161  RS485_send_driver(id, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_Motor_state2, send_data_serial_);
162 
163  data_arr[0] = (int8_t)(receive_data_serial_[4]); // temp
164  data_arr[1] = (int16_t)((receive_data_serial_[5]) | (receive_data_serial_[6] << 8)); // torque current
165  data_arr[2] = (int16_t)((receive_data_serial_[7]) | (receive_data_serial_[8] << 8)); // motor speed
166  data_arr[3] = (int16_t)((receive_data_serial_[9]) | (receive_data_serial_[10] << 8)); // motor angle
167  return error_check();
168 }
169 
170 int8_t X10ApiBase::Motor_state3(uint8_t id, int16_t *data_arr)
171 {
172 
173  RS485_send_driver(id, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_Motor_state3, send_data_serial_);
174  data_arr[0] = (int8_t)receive_data_serial_[4]; // temp
175  data_arr[1] = (int16_t)((receive_data_serial_[5]) | (receive_data_serial_[6] << 8)); // Phase A current
176  data_arr[2] = (int16_t)((receive_data_serial_[7]) | (receive_data_serial_[8] << 8)); // Phase B current
177  data_arr[3] = (int16_t)((receive_data_serial_[9]) | (receive_data_serial_[10] << 8)); // Phase C current
178  return error_check();
179 }

194 int8_t X10ApiBase::speedControl(uint8_t id, int32_t speed)
195 
196 {
197  x10_reg_.a_speedControl[4] = (uint8_t)speed;
198  x10_reg_.a_speedControl[5] = (uint8_t)(speed >> 8);
199  x10_reg_.a_speedControl[6] = (uint8_t)(speed >> 16);
200  x10_reg_.a_speedControl[7] = (uint8_t)(speed >> 24);
201 
202  RS485_send_driver(id, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_speedControl, send_data_serial_);
203  return error_check();
204 }
205 
206 int8_t X10ApiBase::multi_motor_control(int32_t speed)
207 {
208  return speedControl(0xCD, speed);
209 }

211 int8_t X10ApiBase::Motor_mode(uint8_t id, uint8_t &mode)
212 {
213  RS485_send_driver(id, DATA_MAX, x10_reg_.a_Motor_mode, send_data_serial_);
214  mode = receive_data_serial_[10];
215  return error_check();
216 }
